titleStmt.title: The popes ware-house, or, The merchandise of the whore of Rome published for the common good by Titus Oates.
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst, Dorman Newman, Thomas Cockerill, and Tho. Simmons,
